doc.after: On the bottom of the iPhone, there is a speaker to the left of the dock connector and a microphone to the right. There is an additional loudspeaker above the screen that serves as an earpiece during phone calls. The iPhone 4 includes an additional microphone at the top of the unit for noise cancellation, and switches the placement of the microphone and speaker on the base on the unitâthe speaker is on the right.[114] Volume controls are located on the left side of all iPhone models and as a slider in the iPod application.
